item.title: SC
item.description: Security Council Committee Topics: I. Proliferation of Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) and its Role in Conflict in the Middle East II. Securing Critical Infrastructure to Enhance Cybersecurity Capabilities Committee Documents: Background Guide for DAYMUNC is available here. Staff: Director: Allyson Clark Chair: Alex Oxner Rapporteur: TBD If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.

item.title: CSW

Addressing Access to Healthcare for Refugee and Migrant Women and Girls Committee Documents: Background Guide for DAYMUNC is available here. Staff: Director: Jessica Loving Chair: TBD Rapporteur: TBD If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.

item.title: SIMSEC
item.description: SIMSEC Committee Topics: Although there is no background guide, focus the bulk of your research on recent events and relations in Pacific Asia. Committee Documents: There is no background guide provided for the Simulated Security Council - should you have questions concerning this type of committee, please contact the Secretary General. Staff: Director: Alex Elkins Chair: TBD Rapporteur: Connor Morrow If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.

item.title: UNEA

Protection of the Environment in Areas Susceptible to Displacing Persons Committee Documents: Background Guide for DAYMUNC is available here. Staff: Director: Porter Lyons Chair: Csongor Bajnoczki Rapporteur: Tess Golonka If you are interested in applying for a staff position for DAYMUNC, please contact the Secretary General.
